example.name: Example, shows on the top bar and as the tab's title
example.title: Shows as the colorful text, first thing on the scrollable box

images.file: Put the file name here, don't worry about paths, as long as the image is placed inside a folder inside of /pages/cast/characters/assets/ with the same name as the characterId then this should work
images.title: The text that will show up on the banner atop the image on the carousel

images.file: Repeat, important that images is an array, even if you're only going to include one image, otherwise it will break
images.title: You can add as many images as you want, just add a comma after the closing curly bracket } and open a new one {

blockOne.Here what's on the left is customizable: and everything to the right will show up after
blockOne.use this for things that follow the key:: like age: number, occupation: text, username: text
blockOne.mind the CaPiTaLiZaTiOn: the way you write things here is how they'll show up on the page
blockOne.you can add as many key: value pairs as: but I don't recommend going overboard, as it will make the carousel align somewhat weirdly

blockTwo.heading: here's the bulk of the entry
paragraphs: Where you can write continuous text like this, if you have a heading and a paragraphs array (and it's important that this is an array, even if you only have one paragraph, otherwise it will break) then the text will render like this, but if you have a heading and a listItems array then it will render as an unordered list

blockTwo.heading: list example
listItems: good for like, a likes and dislikes list for example

blockTwo.heading: BUT
paragraphs: If you ever need something other than an unordered list or a title + paragraph combo then we can probably arrange that

blockTwo.heading: About
paragraphs: Ferd is the loveliest guy one can meet, somehow finding a way to like something about everything.
He's a relaxed person without a flaw, but interrupting him or his work anytime can lead to lots of frustration.
He also has a girlfriend named Ena Lone who often uses him as a resting pillow.
Unlike her he isn't as talented, but with his best efforts he always tries to support her and participate in projects.
He has no known siblings or parents, no related recorded family, he himself doesn't know from where he came from.

One day he was just found wandering the streets of a city as a child until a kind woman found him and offered shelter, eventually deciding to adopt him.One day he was just found wandering the streets of a city as a child until a kind woman found him and offered shelter, eventually deciding to adopt him.

blockTwo.heading: Trivia
listItems: He looked more distinct when he was created, even having a different name! He was originally based off a friends' cat.
During the times I changed his design to the one we know now, he was supposed to wear the glasses at all times. It looked odd and too cool, so I made them rest on his forehead since then.
Personally, he is my favorite character.

blockTwo.heading: About
paragraphs: Ena Lone is an average plus-sized cuddly bear born in the United States from a Latino Family.
She's a natural born artist with lots of passion for music specifically, and with her explosive energy and unbound motivation she works constantly on her next projects.
She also has a boyfriend named Ferd Ray, who when she's tired serves as a pillow.
Both of them always travel around the world trying to make a hit for the world, but they have yet to succeed.

blockTwo.heading: Trivia
listItems: She is my most popular character to date.
She used to be my persona online for a long time.
Her design, funnily enough, branches off a Fortnite skin.
She was the first anthropomorphic character I have created.
She went through an entire evolution of designs, which inspired some insane lore and characters.
Madness Combat heavily influenced her stories, to this day I'm not really sure what was up with that either.

blockTwo.heading: General Information
paragraphs: Niku Hazune is one of the most recognizable and unique idols in the universe. Originally built to serve as an animatronic in an unknown place with a special voice, her popularity swiftly took off after more and more people started enjoying her pleasant singing.

blockTwo.heading: Appearence
paragraphs: Her appearance always changes, but she's usually seen in turquoise-rimmed gray and black clothing. Depends on which artist she's working with, what event she's sponsoring, all her colors and whole attire change to match the mood - except for her twintails of course, her hair stays the same all around.

blockTwo.heading: Personality
paragraphs: It's hard to describe her exact personality, it all completely depends on who she is working with. Pop, Rock, EDM, Rap, Hip Hop, Classical, Funk, Blues, Jazz, Metal, Trance, and all the other genres, she reprograms her whole identity to produce the best sounding voice for each genre.

blockTwo.heading: History
paragraphs: Where we were walking together? I will see you in the end
I'll take you where you've never been, then bring you back again
Listen to me with your eyes, I'm watching you from in the sky.
If you forget I'll fade away, I'm asking you to let me stay
So bathe me in your magic light, and keep it on in darkest night
I need you here to keep me strong, to live my life and sing along
I'm lying with you wide awake, like your expensive poison snake
You found me here inside a dream, walk through the fire straight to me

blockTwo.heading: Trivia
listItems: She was made to be used for examples and tests in this website!
...And also because of Houston's slight allude to vocaloids even existing in this world.

blockTwo.heading: About
paragraphs: Houston... oh this Houston, not doing any work! Recent intern for the Babylon's Inka study, but instead of studying they choose to just be wild sloppily kissing their boyfriend atop the desks smelling like pure vanilla. Oh my lord, I can't with this unchained evil.

blockTwo.heading: Trivia
listItems: Their golden hair is probably very long
